div.head: Our Results
div.p: A variant of the Ellipsoid Against Hope algorithm of [Papadimitriou & Roughgarden, 2008] that computes an exact, rational CE in polynomial time given a representation satisfying polynomial type and polynomial expectation property; outputs a CE that is a vertex of the set of CE, which has polynomial-sized support.
